xt:extension.xt:author: Christian Lück
xt:extension.xt:name: oXbytei

div.p: oXbytei is an <oXygen/> framework extending TEI P5, developed at SCDH, Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster. It is configured by the document's header and offers high level functions.
Visit the release page to see what's new.

div.head: Included Software and other Material
div.p: The included languageicon icon was desigend by Onur Mustak Cobanli an is distributed on http://languageicon.org by under a CC licence with Relax-Attribution term.

xt:extension.xt:license:
